Package game.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • designpattern.Subject
      • game.model.Player
  • public class Player
extends Subject
    Represents a player and his current state in a Monopoly game. This includes the player's position, owned money and properties and chance cards. In order to use this part of the model with the MVC-pattern, this class extends the Subject of the observer design pattern.
    Author:
    Ekkart Kindler, ekki@dtu.dk

      • setOwnedProperties

        public void setOwnedProperties​(java.util.Set<Property> ownedProperties)
        Sets the list of owned properties to the provided list. Note that the list is copied to avoid it to be changed without the player being aware of it.
        Parameters:
        ownedProperties - the new list of owned properties
